name: 3010: An Office Space Odyssey
description:
An astronaut crashes on a mysterious planet and only has five minutes left of oxygen, an office worker is having his/her usual day messing around with papers and a computer. Can you work together to solve the puzzles shown on weird terminals scattered across the planet?

3010: An Office Space Odyssey is an asynchronous cooperative game where the solution of puzzles is split between two completely different environments with wildly different gameplay mechanics. Solve five puzzles in that many minutes and bring the astronaut to safety!
